name: Google Trend Data Extract, Summarization with Bright Data & Google Gemini

nodes.name: When clicking ‘Test workflow’
nodes.notes: This manualTrigger node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note

parameters.content:
## Note

This workflow deals with the structured data extraction by utilizing Bright Data Web Unlocker Product.

The Basic LLM Chain, Information Extraction, Summarization Chain are being used to demonstrate the usage of the N8N AI capabilities.

**Please make sure to set the web URL of your interest within the "Set URL and Bright Data Zone" node and update the Webhook Notification URL**

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note1

parameters.content:
## LLM Usages

Google Gemini Flash Exp model is being used.

Basic LLM Chain Data Extractor.

Information Extraction is being used for the handling the structured data extraction.

Summarization Chain is being used for building the summary.

parameters.text:
=You need to analyze the below markdown and convert to textual data. Please do not output with your own thoughts. Make sure to output with textual data only with no links, scripts, css etc.

{{ $json.data }}

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Google Trend Data Extract, Summarization with Bright Data & Google Gemini

## Overview
Automated workflow: Google Trend Data Extract, Summarization with Bright Data & Google Gemini. This workflow integrates 12 different services: stickyNote, httpRequest, lmChatGoogleGemini, readWriteFile, chainLlm. It contains 26 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 26
- **Node Types**: 12
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **When clicking ‘Test workflow’**: manualTrigger
- **Sticky Note**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note1**: stickyNote
- **Markdown to Textual Data Extractor**: chainLlm
- **Set URL and Bright Data Zone**: set
- **Initiate a Webhook Notification for Markdown to Textual Data Extraction**: httpRequest
- **Google Gemini Chat Model for Data Extract**: lmChatGoogleGemini
- **Perform Bright Data Web Request**: httpRequest
- **Create a binary data**: function
- **Structured Data Extractor**: informationExtractor
- ... and 16 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
